text: Updates on @cryptorelief_ as we evolve from emergency relief to strategic public health funding. A thread 1/n

@DFYIndia @UNICEF #CryptoRelief #maharashtracsr #Csr

Through funding from @CryptoRelief_ and its partner @GiveIndia , CrisprBits has extended the application of its OmiCrisp platform to wastewater surveillance. https://health.economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/diagnostics/crisprbits-develops-omicrisp-crispr-based-test-to-detect-omicron-non-omicron-variants/97377329… (1/2) ..

Wastewater surveillance can provide valuable information for pandemic preparedness and a robust pathogen detection method is a key step for this. https://linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7034737669691584512… (2/2)

1/4 Q. What is common between *IIT-Madras, IISc Bangalore & IIT-Delhi (top-3 research institutes of India as per NIRF)?* Ans. CRYPTO RELIEF @CryptoRelief_ Read more to know how. NIRF ranking: https://nirfindia.org/2022/researchranking.html…
3/4 @CryptoRelief_ <> @iiscbangalore CR donated $1 Million to help establish genome sequencing facility , once again making India ready to tackle virology challenges of future.

4/4 @CryptoRelief_ <> @iitdelhi CR partnered with USAID & IIT-D under Samridh program which will provide grant to innovative startups. This will help bringforth health sector innovation in the country.

To strengthen grassroots accessibility to basic healthcare facilities in Odisha, we have partnered with @CryptoRelief_ , @nhmodisha and the Govt. of Odisha. With this program we hope to build healthy and resilient communities. @sandeepnailwal
CPR is the single most important thing anyone can do during an emergency. CPR helps keep oxygenated blood flowing to the brain and other crucial organs until normal heart rhythm is restored

@CryptoRelief_ along with @SELCOFoundation supported the initiative to install sustainable solar energy solutions and efficient medical equipment that will be integrated across 1278 healthcare facilities in 10 chosen districts.

The #healthcare sector needs uninterrupted power supply as they cannot afford to lose a single hour of utility. #Solar power can be used to run entire hospital infrastructures that require continuous 24×7 operation such as MRI machines, ventilators and air conditioning units.

Looking at the number of critical care equipments that CryptoRelief has sent to different regions of India. The ethos of @CryptoRelief_ will always be to help people of India. #indiafightscorona #covid #covid19 #pandemic #initiative #helpinghands #medicalequipment

In partnership with @CryptoRelief_ , Govt of Nagaland & the @NagalandNhm , our #decentralized and solar powered solutions for healthcare projects in #Mon district of #Nagaland are off to a great start. Grateful for your support @sandeepnailwal ! @MoHFW_INDIA @DEO_MonDistrict

@CryptoRelief_ has granted 1 million dollars to establish a wastewater-based epidemiology research facility at IIT Madras. The facility will act as an intelligence unit to track and prevent a virus outbreak in its early stages. #covid #Socialimpact #pandemic
We are grateful for the generous contribution from @CryptoRelief_ to the Voice That Cares initiative launched by @heartfulness Institute and @ROCF__ . pandemic.

@CryptoRelief_ along with @RCRCIndia and @enhfoundation launched a large-scale intervention in July 2021, to promote COVID-appropriate behaviour, address vaccination myths and hesitancy and facilitate access to vaccination within rural areas of Uttar Pradesh #COVID19 #Crypto

As an effort to help people affected by the pandemic in every way, @CryptoRelief_ supported an initiative with Samarthan in Panna, Madhya Pradesh, and Kanker, Chhattisgarh to provide relief to communities. #socialimpact #COVID19
In a bid to tackle the threat of the third wave, Crypto Relief supported the @DFYIndia initiative to ensure preparedness of health infrastructure in the rural areas.

During this Omicron crisis in January 2022, with the support of @CryptoRelief_ , @DFYIndia supported and helped run 11 COVID hospitals with more than 1250 beds, including 130 ICU and HDU beds, as well as pediatric COVID care, COVID home isolation, and COVID testing & vaccination

@CryptoRelief supported the Udyogini foundation to make available food, nutrition and medical aids to the vulnerable families in Uttarakhand and Madhya Pradesh. The project focused on creating awareness about vaccines through mobile vans and provided medical aids to families.

Uttarakhand and Madhya Pradesh were identified as the most vulnerable places where the families needed immediate COVID relief and support. Mawai and Joshimath were the two remotest blocks that were selected in the states to implement this project. #cryptorelief #socialimpact

CryptoRelief supported Parivaar organisation’s initiative to provide freshly cooked meals twice a day to the needy in 30 villages of Madhya Pradesh. #socialimpact #covid #pandemic #crypto #cryptorelief

Second wave of Covid left many poor and vulnerable families without any source of support. They not only lost their daily income and assets, but also their sources of food. This placed them at greater risk of hunger and low immunity due to undernourishment. #COVID19 #pandemic

To help these communities, @CryptoRelief_ supported the initiative by @CIF02 (Children of India Foundation) to provide ration kits to many vulnerable families across different states of the country during the pandemic! #CryptoNews #Socialimpact

This initiative helped families take care of their immunity and strength to fight COVID-19 through the distribution of healthy diet kits that fit local consumption patterns. It helped to provide food security, fight malnutrition and reduce the impact of COVID-19 on children.

CryptoRelief supported the @goonj Relief and rehabilitation efforts towards Covid-19 by providing food and medical facilities to the affected communities such as the differently abled, HIV+, sex workers, devadasis and many more #covid #pandemic #socialimpact #covid_19

@CryptoRelief_ CryptoRelief supported the self reliant initiative- Swastha Pahad by Joint Action @srijanofficial and Society for Himalayan Ecology and Geography (SHEG) in collaboration with multiple NGOs, SHGs, and individuals on the ground to save villages in Uttarakhand.

'Swastha Pahad' initiative focused on COVID relief work, covering 750+ villages in remote areas across the hill districts of Uttarakhand, with a population of more than a million people, mostly women and children. #Socialimpact #covid #cryptocurrency

@DFYIndia with the #partnership of @CryptoRelief_ running OPD at rural area along with MMU camp where we give #Awareness and take followup of patients at OPD at Community Health Center, #Marwah, #Chhattisgarh @doctorrajat @ravikantkem @SaketJhaDFY @NITIAayog @MoHFW_INDIA

The fourth NFT from our #GuardianAnimal collection is Simurgh ~ Simurgh is thought to possess all knowledge of the world. It is said that he has seen the destruction of the world three times over.

Why this NFT? The collection of Guardian Animal NFTs was designed by India-based artists from EY. All the proceeds from this sale will be utilized for projects that aim to create a significant #healthcare impact in Indian communities.
How to buy? Visit the link in bio to purchase NFTs from our #GuardianAnimal series.
The third NFT from our #GuardianAnimal collection is JATAYU ~ Jatayu is the demi-god who has the form of a vulture in Ramayana. Jatayu is the ‘King of vultures’. More details

In Ramayana, when Ravana was abducting Sita, a fierce battle took place between him and Jatayu. Jatayu fought valiantly with Ravana but Ravana defeated him, clipping his wings, and Jayatu fell to earth. Jatayu lived long enough to inform about Sita’s abduction to Rama.

@DFYIndia has established 5 Covid hospitals across #India as a part of 3d wave #Covid_19 support through our initiative. (1/2)

The centers have a total capacity of 1000 beds, with 70 ICU beds & 130 pediatrics beds. The centers are created in collaboration with district administration and state health department. All hospitals are established in highly susceptible locations across India. #COVID19
We @CryptoRelief_ are starting 1000 hospital beds with 70 ICU beds with 130 Pediatrics beds in India for 3rd wave of Covid-19 with Doctors For You @DFYIndia !

Through @sandeepnailwal 's Cryptorelief Initiative, we hv strtd 5 hospitals in highly susceptible locations across India. DFY is able to start 1000 beds with 70 ICU beds with 130 Pediatrics beds in India during 3rd wave of Covid-19. #omicron #DFY #cryptorelief #blockchainforimpact

The centers have a total capacity of 1000 beds, with 70 ICU beds & 130 pediatrics beds. The centers are created in collaboration with district administration and state health department. All the hospitals have been started in highly susceptible locations across India. (2/2)
